name: Victor Araujo
tagline: I'm the kind of person who thinks operating systems and their internals are cool :).
body:
### About me

Throughout the years I have gravitated towards distributed systems and performance. Currently studying a master's degree in Pervasive Computing and Communications, an Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree taking place in Université de Lorraine (France), Lappeenranta University of Technology (Finland) and Luleå University of Technology (Sweden).

I enjoy travelling, filter coffee and hiking in volcanoes.

### Contact information
ve.ar91@gmail.com

### Other sites
